content: **there is an error in the pattern ** in the body part there should read **single_crochet decrease* repeat to the end single_crochet to last stitch of this row** not single_crochet 1 decrease repeat to the end of the round **single_crochet 4 decrease sc3 decrease** not single_crochet 4 decrease single_crochet 2 decrease my first crochet pattern this pattern haven´t been tested please contact me if you find any errors have nice crocheting
